name: Amanda Dress 2T instock
description:
This beautiful dress is instock and ready to post! 

It is made using gorgeous Michael Miller Ponies woven Cotton fabric with a pink detachable sash. It buttons down the back using lovely Tessa Ann Hand Made buttons. These dresses are fitted bodice with a full circle skirt so are therefore super twirly. 

This dress is a 2T size.

name: Fishsticks Designs Boxer Briefs Age 2/4/6yrs
description:
This listing is for one pair of gorgeously cute FishSticks designs Boxer Briefs from sizes 2/4/6 yrs. 

Boxers INFORMATIONS:
We use fabulous jersey knit print fabric for the legs and a coordinated plain jersey interlock for the cuffs, waist and fly. These are elasticated around the waist for a perfect fit. 
 
Undies sizes range from 2-12 yrs(8-12yrs see separate listing)

Please let me know at checkout which jersey knit print you would like. 
http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.426205963537.196544.231541853537&type=3
If you would like bigger sizes then please see the separate listings

name: Fishsticks Designs Undies Age 2/4/6yrs
description:
This listing is for one pair of gorgeously cute FishSticks designs Little Ones Undies from sizes 2/4/6 yrs

UNDIES INFORMATIONS:
We use soft bamboo velour for the inner layer or plain cotton interlock if preferred and gorgeously cute knit prints for the outer layer, making these super cute and comfy undies. There is no elastic in these undies making them suitable for anyone with sensitive skin. Leg bands and waist are made using a 4 way stretch cotton lycra, making these undies very comfortable to wear.
 
Undies sizes range from 2-12 yrs(8-12yrs see separate listing)

Please let me know at checkout which jersey knit print you would like for the outer layer and whether you would prefer either Bamboo velour inner or cotton jersey interlock.
http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.426205963537.196544.231541853537&type=3
If you would like bigger sizes then please see the separate listings

name: Exclusive Snugglebots Clothing Club Slots *Deposit Only*
description:
How would you like to have gorgeous Snugglebots clothing drop through your letter box every month? Yes, then you need to join our exclusive clothing Club!

The Snugglebots Clothing club offers a range of clothing options for you to choose from, every month i will produce a completely new girly and a gender neutral colourway on bamboo velour (if that's the option you choose) these colourways will stay exclusive to club members for 6 months before being available to non-club members. Or if your prefered choice is to have an item made from jersey knit fabric then i will choose a completely new girly/gn fabric each month! 

Here's how it works:

Choose your clothing item from the list below
Choose either girly or gender neutral
Choose your size required 
Choose either 3 (save 5% off retail prices) or 6 (save 10% of retail prices) month subscriptions
If you would like more than one item of clothing per month then please add as many slots slots to your basket that you require. 

Current members will have priority for future clubs 

Price List (Prices based on either 3 or 6 months subscriptions, you receive One item of clothing per month and the price below is per month)

Price are for ages 0-5yrs
Jersey Hooded Top  - £19.95 (3mths) £18.90 (6mths)
Bamboo Velour Hooded Top - £23.75(3mths) £22.50 (6mths)
Jersey Patrick Raglan Top LS - £19(3mths) £18(6mths)
Jersey Patrick Raglan Top SS - £17.10(3mths) £16.10(6mths)
Criss-Cross Jersey Dress - £19.95(3mths) £18.90(6mths)
T42 LS Top - £17.10(3mths) £16.10 (6mths)
T42 SS Top - £17.10(3mths) £16.10 (6mths)
Jersey Four Panel Skirt - £17.10 (3mths) £16.10 (6mths)
Bamboo Velour Four Panel Skirt - £19 (3mths) £18 (6mths) 

Prices are for ages 6-12yrs
Jersey Hooded Top  - £25.65(3mths) £24.30(6mths)
Bamboo Velour Hooded Top - £28.50(3mths) £27(6mths)
Jersey Patrick Raglan Top LS - £21.85(3mths) £20.70(6mths)
Jersey Patrick Raglan Top SS - £19.95(3mths) £18.90(6mths)
T42 LS Top - £19.95(3mths) £18.90 (6mths) upto 8yrs
T42 SS Top - £19.95(3mth) £18.90(6mths) upto 8yrs

All print jerseys used will be of very high (HTF) quality. 

Postage to be added to the above prices 

If you would like the option to pay your 3 or 6 month subscription monthly then let me know and i can arrange to invoice you each month. 
Payment will be due at the beginning of each month. Clothing item/s will be cut and sewn throughout the month and sent out in the last week of each month.

This slot is a deposit (non-refundable) only to secure your place on the Snugglebots exclusive clothing club, full payment will be required prior to commencing your club. 

Jersey used will be from both my current instock range and specially bought in for these clubs.

Any questions please feel free to ask

The Clothing pictured is an example only and not the item you will receive.

Please note these are SURPRISE slots. Before purchasing one of these exclusive slots please thinking carefully about whether or not you like surprises!

name: Snugglebots Exclusive Yarn Club *deposit only* 3 Month Subcription  October onwards
description:
How would you like to have gorgeous, new and exclusive Snugglebots yarn drop through your letter box every month? Yes, then you need to join our fabulous Yarn Club!

The Snugglebots yarn club offers a range of scrumptious yarn bases to choose from, every month i will produce a completely new girly and a gender neutral colourway, these colourways  will stay exclusive to club members for 6 months before being available to non-club members. 

Here's how it works:

Choose your yarn base from the options below 
Choose how much you would like (prices based per 100g) 
Choose  Trim (Optional extra 50g)
Choose either girly or gender neutral

To begin with i will be limiting this club to just 10 members (current members will have priority for future clubs) 
Club members can pre-order upto 500g of club yarn per month. 

Price List (Prices based on either 3  subscriptions, you receive 100g of club yarn per month )
                                                                                           
Organic Merino Aran -   £27 (3Mths) 
Superwash Merino Aran - £27 (3Mths)
BFL Aran - £27 (3Mths)
Superwash BFL Aran - £27 (3Mths) 
Organic merino DK - £27 (3Mths)
Superwash Merino DK - £27 (3Mths)
Sparkle DK -  £35.60 (3Mths)        
Tweed DK -  £29.90  (3Mths)

All trims are 50g and priced at half the price of 100g

If you would like the option to pay your 3 month subscription monthly then let me know and i can arrange to invoice you each month. 
Payment will be due at the beginning of each month and yarns will be dyed and sent out in the last week of each month.
This slot is a deposit (non-refundable) only to secure your place on the Snugglebots exclusive yarn club, full payment will be required prior to commencing your yarn club. 

Please note this is a 3 month subscription only and will commence in May 2012 for 3 months.

Any questions please feel free to ask

name: Womens Custom Order "Dundies" Underwear Plain jersey
description:
This listing for fabulous custom made Dundies Womens underwear in gorgeous plain cotton/lycra fabric

Dundies are comfortable, sporty looking and elastic free underwear for women. They are flattering to all shapes and are a perfect combination of fun and are totally practical. Due to being elastic free they are perfect for women that are sensitive to latex or simply dont like the feeling of elastic or lace.

Dundies feature soft fabric bands at the leg and waist and are made from stretch fabric that won’t lose its shape. Due to the unique design, Dundies underwear fit a wide variety of shapes and body types without pinching or riding up.

Dundies are designed to be made of cotton/lycra fabric with four-way stretch so you know they'll keep their shape wash after wash. I can make Dundies in alternative fabrics but they may have more or less stretch than the standard cotton/lycra fabric. Dundies made from these specialty fabrics may fit differently; please check if you have any questions about fabric and fit.

The most unique feature of Dundies are the stretchy fabric bands that keep underwear from drooping without cutting into skin. Dundies are perfect for people with sensitivities to elastic or latex, or those that just can't stand tight clothing.

Our Dundies can be made using either plain Cotton/Lycra (Black, white, Sky blue, Red, Lilac) or any of the Cotton/Lycra Printed jersey i currently have in stock, please see my gallery http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.426205963537.196544.231541853537&type=3, if you choose a jersey without a lycra content i will let you know that the fit and wear may slightly differ to those with lycra in them. 
This listing is for Dundies made using our fabulous plain cotton/lycra jersey if you prefer our printed cotton/lycra please see my other listing. 

Sizes Available S-XL

S Hips 33-38"
M Hips 37-43"
L Hips 42-49"
XL Hips 48-53"


You may order as many pairs of Dundies as you like with this custom order, full payment will be required prior to commencing your order. Postage to be added once your order is finalized. Please allow upto 6 weeks for your order to be completed.

I am an official Licence holder of the fabulous Dundies Womens Pattern from Fussy Butts

Pictures shown are examples of my work only and not the item you will receive.

1. Choose your colourway/s from my gallery http://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.382372663537.160733.231541853537&type=3 or choose your own custom colours
2, Choose your yarn base/s from the list below #
3. Choose how much you would like (Maximum total per custom slot is 1KG)

Yarn Bases Available, price is per 100g
Sparkle DK £12.50
Tweed DK 10.50
Organic Merino Aran £9.50
SuperWash Merino Aran £9.50
Superwash Merino DK £9.50
BFL Aran £9.50
BFL DK £9.50
Singles Roving Style Superwash merino DK £9.50


If there is a yarn base you do not see listed but would like then please let me know and i can see if i can order it in.

Full payment will be required prior to dyeing your order, approx delivery is between 2-6weeks from when final payment is made. Postage will be added once you finalize your order. 

Yarns pictured are not the yarns you will receive
Handwash cool.

Pictures shown are examples of my work only and not the item you will receive.

name: Waterfall on Sparkle DK yarn
description:
Gorgeously soft and sparkly yarn in my newest colourway "Waterfall" perfect to keep you snuggly!

Sparkle Yarn specifications:
75% Extra Fine Merino
20% Silk
5% Silver Stellina Sparkle
Approx 212m per 100g

This listing is per 100g
Handwash cool.

name: Winter Wonderland Gender Neutral on Tweed DK
description:
Gorgeously soft yarn in my newest colourway "Winter Wonderland" in gender neutral colours this yarn is perfect to keep you snuggly

Tweed yarn is made up of two strands merino and one strand superwash merino which will pick up the dye more to create a gorgeous twist effect throughout the yarn 

Tweed DK Yarn specifications:
2 Ends Merino 
1 End Superwash Merino

Approx 225m per 100g

This listing is per 100g
Handwash cool.

name: Exclusive Snugglebots Yarn Club "Deposit Only"
description:
How would you like to have gorgeous, new and exclusive Snugglebots yarn drop through your letter box every month? Yes, then you need to join our fabulous Yarn Club!

The Snugglebots yarn club offers a range of scrumptious yarn bases to choose from, every month i will produce a completely new girly and a gender neutral colourway, these colourways will stay exclusive to club members for 6 months before being available to non-club members. 

Here's how it works:

Choose your yarn base from the options below 
Choose how much you would like (prices based per 100g) 
Choose Trim (Optional extra 50g)
Choose either girly or gender neutral
Choose Semi-Solid or Colourway or have a bit of both
Choose either 3 (save 5% off retail prices) or 6 (save 10% of retail prices) month subscriptions

Current members will have priority for future clubs 
Club members can pre-order upto 800g of club yarn per month. 

Price List (Prices based on either 3 or 6 months subscriptions, you receive 100g of club yarn per month )

Organic Merino Aran - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30(6Mths)
Superwash Merino Aran - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30 (6Mths)
BFL Aran - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30 (6Mths)
Superwash BFL Aran - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30 (6Mths)
Organic merino DK - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30 (6Mths)
Superwash Merino DK - £27 (3Mths) / £51.30 (6Mths)
Singles Roving Style Superwash Merino DK - £27 (3mths) / £51.30 (6mths)

Sparkle DK - £35.60 (3Mths) / £67.50 (6Mths) 

Tweed DK - £29.90 (3Mths) / £56.70 (6Mths)

All trims are 50g and priced at half the price of 100g

If you would like the option to pay your 3 or 6 month subscription monthly then let me know and i can arrange to invoice you each month. 
Payment will be due at the beginning of each month and yarns will be dyed and sent out in the last week of each month.
This slot is a deposit (non-refundable) only to secure your place on the Snugglebots exclusive yarn club, full payment will be required prior to commencing your yarn club. 

Any questions please feel free to ask

The Yarn pictured is an example only and no the item you will receive.

name: New Petticoat Dress in gorgeous designer fabric Age 5-6
description:
Gorgeous new style Petticoat dress in lovely summery Michael Miller green Polka Dot designer fabric. 

This gorgeous dress is simple yet very stylish, versatile and comfortable to wear. It can be worn in a number of ways depending on the occasion, perfect for a party or for everyday use playing around in the garden on warm summer days, in cooler weather its perfect for wearing with a top underneath and leggings! 

Materials:
Skirt - 100% Cotton

name: Clothing custom order *October* Deposit Only
description:
You may pick whatever you like from everything i currently make!. There is no limit on what you'd like to order too!

 Currently, i sew most of the Fishsticks designs, patterns by Friggy and Kitschy Coo plus lots more of my own :-D 
Choose from dungarees, all kinds of dresses perfect for all occasions, trousers, shorts, hoodies, lounge sets, coats and tops.  

I use all sorts of fabric, gorgeous designer cottons, cord, fleece, jersey, wool interlock and luxuriously soft hand dyed bamboo velour. 

Check out my fabric gallery and past orders on my Facebook page http://www.facebook.com/media/albums/?id=231541853537 some of my fabric is HTF and will therefore carry a surcharge. 

The approximate turn-around for the custom order is 2-6 weeks from the time final payment is received.

The £10 purchase price of this custom slot is considered the deposit and is non-refundable. I will communicate with you regarding the details of your order through email. Once the details have been finalized I will invoice you for the remaining balance. The balance is due before any work will begin.. Postage will be added once your order is finalized.

Please note the pictures shown are just  examples of my work not the item/s you will receive from buying this slot
